context.name: Yukon Photon RT 6x50S Night Vision Rifle Scope
context.excerpt: The Yukon Photon RT 6x50S Night Vision Rifle Scope is one of the best budget night vision scopes available.
context.content:
The Yukon Photon RT 6x50S Night Vision Rifle Scope is one of the best budget night vision scopes available. Featuring high shock resistance, up to .375 calibre, the Photon Night Vision Scope is capable of handling high recoil firearms. Remote operation, viewing and live streaming are all available via your mobile phone with the Stream Vision App.

Yukon Photon RT 6x50S Night Vision Rifle Scope Features

High nighttime sensitivity
High magnification 6 / 12Ñ…
Integrated video recorder
IPX5 Water & dust protection
Quick-change power supply
Daytime operation possibility
Integrated invisible IR illuminator
Recording and live YouTube streaming
Integration with iOS and Android devices
User selectable reticles: 6 shapes, 4 colours
Remote review and operation using smartphone
Mounting on firearm with standard 30 mm rings
Shock resistant for heavy calibers: 12 gauge, 9.3x64, .375H&H
